name: Alaska Floats & Skis
about: Alaska Floats & Skis is a premier flight school specializing in off-airport and seaplane training. Located near Talkeetna, Alaska, we offer a range of courses including float plane ratings, ski plane training, bush pilot techniques, and mountain flying. Our programs include ground instruction, flight time, and lodging, ensuring a comprehensive learning experience. We also provide recurrent training, flight reviews, and adventure flights. With experienced instructors and stunning Alaskan landscapes, we equip pilots with the skills and judgment necessary for safe off-airport operations. Join us for an unparalleled aviation experience in one of the world's most breathtaking environments.
